items.content_html: A lightweight, visually engaging Kanban board application built using Framer Motion, Next.js 14, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS. This project was developed for learning purposes, focusing on creating a sleek and responsive task management tool.

items.content_html: A lightweight Todo List application built with React, Vite, and TypeScript. This app allows users to effortlessly add, edit, and delete tasks, providing a clean and efficient way to manage daily activities. The project demonstrates the use of React components, hooks, and TypeScript for type safety, with basic styling implemented using CSS.
items.title: Gadisa16/react-typescript-Todo-list-app: A lightweight Todo List application built with React, Vite, and TypeScript. This app allows users to effortlessly add, edit, and delete tasks, providing a clean and efficient way to manage daily activities. The project demonstrates the use of React components, hooks, and TypeScript for type safety, with basic styling implemented using CSS.

items.content_html: The Time Zone Converter is a lightweight web application designed to help users convert time between different time zones. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this tool is perfect for anyone needing to coordinate across multiple regions or simply check the current time in another part of the world.

Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this tool is perfect for anyone needing to coordinate across multiple regions or simply check the current time in another part of the world.

items.content_html: Weather API A lightweight API providing real-time weather data and 5-day forecasts. Features include customizable units, multilingual support, and easy integration. Built with Node.js and Express, leveraging OpenWeatherMap for accurate weather information.
